message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as I can. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Bob, I understand your desire to save, but $14,000 is already a competitive price for what this product offers.  Could you meet me halfway at $12,500?
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
